english_example_sentence: I always cover the old book with a new cover.
russian_example_sentence: Я всегда накрываю старую книгу новой обложкой.
turkish_example_sentence: Ben her zaman eski kitabı yeni bir kapakla örterim.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben her zaman eski kitabı yeni bir kapakla ______.
